update sys_config
Config_Value = #{configValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Created_TS = #{createdTs,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

Last_Modified_By = #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where Config_Name = #{configName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_config set Config_Value = #{configValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Created_TS = #{createdTs,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Created_By = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Last_Modified_By = #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Last_Modified_TS = #{lastModifiedTs,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Config_Name = #{configName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
